Name: TaskContainerSettings
SummaryComment: The container settings for a task.

Key.Name: ContainerRunOptions
Key.SummaryComment: Additional options to the container create command.
Key.RemarksComment: These additional options are supplied as arguments to the "docker create" command, in addition to those controlled by the Batch Service.

Key.Name: ImageName
Key.SummaryComment: The image to use to create the container in which the task will run.
Key.RemarksComment: This is the full image reference, as would be specified to "docker pull". If no tag is provided as part of the image name, the tag ":latest" is used as a default.

Key.Name: Registry
Key.SummaryComment: The private registry which contains the container image.
Key.RemarksComment: This setting can be omitted if was already provided at pool creation.
